# Spellbook Protection (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[0 Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 0]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a pinch of metal shavings)

**Range:** Touch

**Effect:** One spellbook

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (object)
**Spell Resistance:** Yes (object)

**Source:** Book of Arcane Magic (Four Winds Fantasy Gaming), pg. 28

In placing this minor ward on your spellbook, you ensure that no one but youself can safely handle the book. Anyone besides you who tries to pick up or open your spellbook will take a shock of 1d3 points of electricity damage.
